"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey: This song is an anthem of hope and perseverance. It's a perfect choice for a soundtrack because it reminds us to keep pushing forward and never give up on our dreams.

"I'm So Lonely I Could Die" by Roy Orbison: This song captures the loneliness and isolation that can sometimes accompany adulthood and the pursuit of one's dreams. It's a powerful reminder that we're not alone in our struggles and that we should never be afraid to reach out for help when we need it.

"Best Day of My Life" by American Authors: This song is a celebration of the little moments that make life worth living. It's a great choice for a soundtrack because it reminds us to appreciate the beauty in everyday moments and to make the most of every day.

"Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen: This song is a poignant reflection on the fleeting nature of life and the importance of finding meaning and purpose in our lives. It's a perfect choice for a soundtrack because it reminds us to cherish the time we have and to live our lives with intention and purpose.

"I Can't Help Falling in Love with You" by Elvis Presley: This song is a classic love ballad that captures the power of attraction and the joy of finding someone who makes our hearts skip a beat. It's a great choice for a soundtrack because it reminds us of the importance of love and the impact it can have on our lives.
